text: Allahqoli Khan Zanganeh was a Kurdish nobleman from the Zanganeh tribe, who served as the governor of Kermanshah under the Zand dynasty from the mid 1750s till his death in 1785, when the Ardalan governor Khosrow Khan Bozorg defeated him and seized the city. == Sources == * * Category:Zanganeh Category:Zand governors of Kermanshah Category:18th-century Iranian people Category:People from Kermanshah Category:Iranian Kurdish people
title: Allahqoli Khan Zanganeh
